resources.string: Application will track your physical activity by using the sensors from your phone. Application will fire a reminder notification based on your past activities and remind you to stand up. Please keep your phone with you.

Yes application will keep tracking weather you are standing or walking while you are driving. It will remind you to pull over the car and stretch your legs if you were sitting in the car for more than one hour.
We use built in sensors from the phone, such as accelerometer and your network to calculate your movement. The accuracy will depend on how good your phone sensors are.
We suggest you to put your phone in pocket, bag, keep it in your hand. Just make sure your phone stays somewhere close to your body.

We use built-in sensors from your phone to track your activity. We are not using GPS or any other power hungry sensors to consume less power. Application will stop tracking your activities automatically when your in sleep (i.e. Sleep mode is enabled).
Due to limitations of some device or security, Stand up may forcibly. stopped. Make the app whitelisted and allow it to run in background.
